title: New Client
body:
It's been about 3 days since the new client has been 'activated' shall I say and my client hasn't been updated yet. I've tried the hextech tool that the bot in support recommended to me but it changed nothing whatsoever. I tried restarting the client, reinstalling league and I haven't seen any difference. Also, sometimes my client sometimes stops working and is frozen for a few seconds. I THINK (major emphasis on think) that since my client hasn't been updated yet, I THINK that my client is freezing because it hasn't been updated yet. Any help would be appreciated in how I can manually upgrade my client or if there is some other issue! 
_

replies.body:
If you're still able to play League, then you've proooooobably already updated to the new client sometime in the past. Let me know if your client looks like the one below, if so then you've already updated!

https://i.gyazo.com/c54780a03076ad108984d27650c6a619.jpg
Yea it looks kind of like that...Ill do a reinstall using the hextech toolkit just to make sure. Thanks for your help!

Then you've already got the new client if yours looks like that picture ^_^!

Those client freezes are probably related to something else entirely. We can try doing a reinstall but that may not help either. With the new client came a few new features as well, so let's try one of those first before having to wait on a reinstall. Open the client settings in the upper right hand corner and turn on "Low Spec Mode", then test it in a custom/practice game.

Let me know if low spec mode helps!!
